nodes.bodyText: This is a bug. workspace-base page does not have isLoaded function which is called in waitForLoad function.
wait-utils. file changes is not related to the bug. I can undo this file if you would like.
why was try and catch remove?

Error caught in catch block is not handled and not passed on. Test continued and it made troubleshooting much harder to find what happened. So I want the test to stop when error happens and let handleTestEvent capture screenshot and save page content in a file.
